video.title: Dallas
video.synopsis: More than 20 years after their final curtain call, the Ewings return with both new and familiar faces -- and all the treachery of the original series.

episodes.synopsis: Two decades since viewers last saw them, the Ewings are back and gathering at Southfork Ranch for the upcoming wedding of Bobby's adopted son.
episodes.title: Changing of the Guard

episodes.synopsis: The plot to take control of Southfork gets complicated when two-timing affairs and blackmail arise, and J.R. starts to ask one too many questions.
episodes.title: Hedging Your Bets

episodes.synopsis: Just as John Ross sets out to claim his birthright and make his father proud, J.R. decides to move back to Southfork, much to Ann's dismay.
episodes.title: The Price You Pay

episodes.synopsis: John Ross seeks to gain an upper hand on a family member and resorts to blackmail, but J.R. decides to handle the situation his own way.
episodes.title: The Last Hurrah

episodes.synopsis: With tension mounting between the newly married Christopher and Rebecca, family ties begin to unravel when the deed to Southfork is revealed.
episodes.title: Truth and Consequences

episodes.synopsis: John Ross is bothered by the weight of having to do his father's dirty work and moves into Southfork. Strife continues to grow between Ann and Bobby.
episodes.title: The Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: Rebecca reveals a life-changing secret to Elena. Still riling from his interaction with Bobby, Ann's ex-husband demands an apology.
episodes.title: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: When murder hangs over the Ewing household, they're forced to make decisions for the good of the family. Christopher moves closer to his dream.
episodes.title: No Good Deed

episodes.synopsis: John Ross learns the value of family when he must choose between blood and oil. Sue Ellen and Rebecca are prey to men who could destroy their lives.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: In the dramatic season finale, family bonds bring the Ewings together as a loved one faces a medical crisis. Long-buried secrets are revealed.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: In the second season premiere, the battle for Ewing Energies heats up as Christopher and John Ross clash over opposing visions for the company.
episodes.title: Battle Lines

episodes.synopsis: With Christopher and Bobby at the helm of Ewing Energies, J.R. and John Ross strike a deal to wrestle control of Ewing Energies away from them.
episodes.title: Venomous Creatures

episodes.synopsis: When new evidence mysteriously surfaces pointing to foul play in Tommy's disappearance, Christopher aims to connect Pamela to the crime.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: With the future of Ewing Energies in jeopardy, Christopher does everything possible to keep a key deal alive, while J.R. works to undermine Pamela.
episodes.title: False Confessions

episodes.synopsis: Ryland continues his onslaught of Ann, exposing secrets from her past that threaten to destroy her. An enemy from the Ewings' past resurfaces.
episodes.title: Trial and Error

episodes.synopsis: John Ross continues to persuade Sue Ellen to help him take control of Ewing Energies. Christopher and Pamela work toward settling their divorce.
episodes.title: Blame Game

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of John Ross and Sue Ellen's coup to take over Ewing Energies, Bobby retaliates with the help of his brother Gary.
episodes.title: The Furious and the Fast

episodes.synopsis: After a lifetime of scheming and dealing, J.R. Ewing finally meets his end as the unlikely victim of a random mugging.
episodes.title: J.R.'s Masterpiece

episodes.synopsis: As Bobby, Christopher and John Ross get to work on J.R.'s masterpiece, J.R.'s will has lasting ramifications for the family legacy and Southfork.
episodes.title: Ewings Unite!

episodes.synopsis: Peace among the Ewings is threatened when catastrophe strikes and Christopher's technology is believed to be the cause.
episodes.title: Guilt & Innocence

episodes.synopsis: A conspiracy emerges intent on keeping Christopher to blame for recent events and to cripple Ewing Energies. Ryland makes a move against Drew.
episodes.title: Let Me In

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of Cliff and Ryland putting Ewing Energies on the verge of collapse, the Ewings battle back with J.R.'s masterpiece to guide them.
episodes.title: A Call to Arms

episodes.synopsis: After Pamela proves her loyalty to John Ross, he goes out on a limb to let her in on J.R.'s master plan. Drew confides in Elena about a dark secret.
episodes.title: Love & Family

episodes.synopsis: When John Ross and Pamela make a shocking discovery about a foe's whereabouts the night J.R. was killed, Bobby must reveal more of J.R.'s master plan.
episodes.title: Guilt by Association

episodes.synopsis: When the shocking answer to the question, "Who killed J.R.?" is finally revealed, the stage is deliciously set for new alliances and battles to begin.
episodes.title: Legacies

episodes.synopsis: Despite everything Cliff Barnes did to bring down the Ewing family, they're on top once again, sending John Ross on a major power trip.
episodes.title: The Return

episodes.synopsis: John Ross locks horns with Bobby over his plans for Ewing Global. Ellen suspects John Ross of infidelity, which could derail her alliance with him.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: As the race to secure capital for the Arctic Lease auction heats up, Bobby scrambles to thwart John Ross's efforts to frack on Southfork.
episodes.title: Playing Chicken

episodes.synopsis: Afton, Ray and Lucy return to Southfork for the big wedding. But the groom, John Ross, has skipped out to strike a deal with a family adversary.
episodes.title: Lifting the Veil

episodes.synopsis: Bobby and Sue Ellen try to use the governor to keep John Ross from becoming just like his father -- a move that could divide the family forever.
episodes.title: D.T.R.

episodes.synopsis: Bobby's appointed as Railroad Commissioner, and John Ross scrambles to keep the Arctic lease deal alive, at the risk of betraying his loved ones.
episodes.title: Like Father, Like Son

episodes.synopsis: As Bobby and Ann push to get Sue Ellen released, John Ross enlists the help of one of J.R.'s last business partners to gain control of Ewing Global.
episodes.title: Like a Bad Penny

episodes.synopsis: Pamela discovers John Ross has been sleeping with Emma; the resulting pandemonium threatens not only their relationship but Bobby and Ann's as well.
episodes.title: Where There's Smoke

episodes.synopsis: The Ewing family searches for answers as to who set the fire at Southfork Ranch. John Ross and Emma struggle with their role in Pamela's overdose.
episodes.title: Denial, Anger, Acceptance

episodes.synopsis: The dark cloud over Southfork grows with news of a family death. John Ross tries to redeem himself with Pam, who faces the truth about her overdose.
episodes.title: Dead Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: Elena confronts the Ewings for what J.R. did to her father and for framing Cliff. Nicolas's plan to steal Ewing Global for the cartel advances.
episodes.title: Hurt

episodes.synopsis: Ewing Global goes public, sending everyone scrambling to claim ownership. Bobby asks his old flame, Tracey, to help him regain control of the company.
episodes.title: Victims of Love

episodes.synopsis: In the wake of a devastating family kidnapping, Bobby puts everything on the line to save lives. John Ross and Pamela form a truce of sorts.
episodes.title: Boxed In

episodes.synopsis: As Christopher searches for Elena, Bobby is double-crossed by the cartel. No longer able to sit by, John Ross risks his own life to attempt a rescue.
episodes.title: Endgame

episodes.synopsis: In season finale, the Ewings and the Rylands finally confront the cartel. Bobby and Sue Ellen form a new alliance to protect the family.
episodes.title: Brave New World
